de.uni_stuttgart.ims.corpus.comparatives.jdpa

Class JDPAAnnotationConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.ims.corpus.comparatives.jdpa.JDPAAnnotationConverter

  • public class JDPAAnnotationConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts a document with JDPA Knowtator annotations into annotations that we can use for SRL later. Writes out all comparative sentences and their annotations. Discards annotations that do not correspond to a complete token or are not in the same sentence.
    Author:
    kesslewd

        Tokenizer

      • useCoref

        private static boolean useCoref
        If an annotation is not found in the sentence, whether to try follow the coreference chain to find an coreferent annotation in the same sentence.

      • doEquativesReordering

        private static boolean doEquativesReordering
        For equative comparisons, set entities 1 and 2 in the order of appearance in the sentence.

        Do some complicated stuff for aspects.

        private java.lang.String filename
        Per-document. Stores document name (recorded as part of annotation).

        private java.lang.String text
        Per-document. Stores plain text of document.

      • sentenceSpans

        private de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.tools.TextSpan[] sentenceSpans
        Per-document. Stores found sentence boundaries.

      • sentenceAnnotations

        private SentenceAnnotation[] sentenceAnnotations
        Per-document. Stores all found annotations by sentence. Zero or one annotation per sentence. Length: sentenceSpans.length

      • sentenceTokenizations

        private de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.tools.TextSpan[][] sentenceTokenizations
        Per-document. Stores found token boundaries of the sentences that have been identified in sentenceSpans. Length: sentenceSpans.length
